website_summaries.verdict: All-in-all, people love the Under Armour SpeedForm Velociti Graphic. This running shoe is a solid choice for daily exercise sessions. The midsole unit’s reactive yet robust construction and the upper’s breathable and form-fitting design are the highlighted elements. On the other hand, some reviewers have criticized the irritating in-shoe experience given by the upper unit.Fans of road running shoes that cater to the neutral pronation of the foot are the target market of the SpeedForm Velociti Graphic.
pros: The fabrics of the Under Armour SpeedForm Velociti Graphic’s upper unit are praised for delivering a secure yet flexible coverage
A handful of purchasers have expressed their happiness with the breathable silhouette
Some testers have mentioned that the underfoot cushioning system is responsive enough
A few runners claim that the midsole has a thicker structure which contributes to a fuller underfoot feel
The lightweight nature of this Under Armour running shoe is welcomed by many consumers
The flexibility of this product is lauded by runners
cons: A few testers claim that the forefoot section of the upper unit has a tendency to rub irritatingly against the skin of the foot
A couple of people have noticed the heel cup rubbing against the ankles

customer_reviews.title: No bad but , not enough .
customer_reviews.text: Im the owner of various nike Shoes , including two pair of nike pegasus 35 and 36 and ...... im sorry under armour you did well with theese shoes but pegasus are by far better , i love them And probably after this try i will not change to other brand any time soon ... my favorite pegasus 35 shield .....
customer_reviews.author: Andy cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these daily for about 4 months, and I’ve got a little more wear on the fabric near the pinky toe than I would like, although there’s no holes yet. My feet tend to touch when I walk, so I get wear on the cushioning near the toes. On these shoes, the cushioning is a soft material, so it’s been scraped away by the hard sole, but it’s not as bad as some shoes I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Raab

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: Starting to fall apart at the sides after only a few months. Not worth the money. Look great at first though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I typically have to order 1/2 size larger shoe when ordering UA shoes but this time them where still to small.
customer_reviews.author: rwh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these and for the price you can’t beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Colin A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: I find these shoes to be perfect. I liked the black ones so much that I bought the white ones too a year later. They're light, very comfortable and breathable. They work very well in almost all occasions: Sports, running, travelling and just casual wear. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moughames

customer_reviews.title: HANDSOME SHOE, FIT IS PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: AFTER ORDERING COMPETITORS SHOE, SIZE CHART WAS STUPID WRONG. THE U-A SHOE WAS PERFECT FIT, GREAT SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Bought it as my secondary shoe for sprints and tempo runs. Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Fit a little small but it works . I’d buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bsinthusy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very comfortable, streamline look and color was on target.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieJohnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I personally think that my Nikes are made better & more comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: TGF

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Got the red/black shoes for my boyfriends birthday- ordered half a size up (12) and he says they’re perfect so it appears they run small. Other than that he loves them and they’re his new favorite gym shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Raeann

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I really like it , perfect for the gym 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mutasem Qasem

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size. Don’t buy - cheap feeling too. Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.author: David R. Bridge

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Speedform Velociti Gr Training Shoes
feature_bullets: STYLE RACING: this shoe, which is synonymous with speed, offers a sensation of extraordinary lightness and a flexible cushioning system
The innovative Under Armour SpeedForm structure shapes itself on the foot for a precise fit, eliminating any distraction
The structured mesh offers a light and comfortable fit combined with extraordinary breathability
The internal buttress ensures optimal structure and support combined with lightness
Built-in midsole for extra cushioning and perfect comfort
